ahc-presentation.hi: Hey! Thanks for visiting my humble cave. I am Alberto, an IT pasionate, eager to travel, learn new things and work on my own ideas. From Spain, living the deutsch dream in Berlin.
ahc-presentation.contact: Feel free to know more about my professional profile in here, and dont hesitate to contact me for any doubt/feedback you have. You are welcome! :)
